page.title: 17Interview _ Town Councillor
page.content: Mr.Thacker has been a{town councillor for about 15 years,standing for the Labour Party.He chose to be a councillor because he wanted to do something for the town.A councillor's work is{voluntary}and unpaid.There are 5000 electors in Sth.Elmsall.There are 12 members on the council.The majority represent the Labour Party,the rest represent the Ratepayers.The full council meet once a month at{Weston {Hall,}named after a former councillor. The hall is regularly used for other purposes,such as the Brownies,a Probation Service and the headquarters of a local Youth Employment Service.The council is funded through the rates and spends about Â£60,000 a year maintaining such things as allotment gardens,{social centre}and park which has a children's playground and sports amenities.
